scripts.build_frontendWin: rmdir /s /q build && cd ./client && npm run build && xcopy build ..\build /s /e /y /i
scripts.build_frontendMac: rm -rf build && cd ./client && npm run build && cp -r build ../build
scripts.deployMac: npm run build_frontendMac && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy_heroku
scripts.deployWin: npm run build_frontendWin && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy_heroku
